config.section.general.name: General
config.bite-faster.name: Bite Faster
config.bite-faster.description: It reduces the time it takes for fish to bite the bait.
config.hit-automatically.name: Hit Automatically
config.hit-automatically.description: You do not need to click the mouse to go to the minigame. If the feature to skip the minigame is enabled, you will caught the fish.
config.skip-minigame.name: Skip Minigame
config.skip-minigame.description: Skip the minigame and caught the fish.
config.fish-easy-caught.name: Fish Easy Caught
config.fish-easy-caught.description: In the minigame, the fish icon chases the bar.
config.treasure-always-be-found.name: Treasure Always Be Found
config.treasure-always-be-found.descript: The treasure will appear every time. This works even if you want to skip the minigame.
config.treasure-easy-caught.name: Treasure Easy Caught
config.treasure-easy-caught.description: In the minigame, the treasure icon follows the bar.
config.always-caught-double-fish.name: Always Caught Double Fish
config.always-caught-double-fish.descrip: If the bait is Wild Bait, it always catches two fish.
config.caught-double-fish-on-any-bait.na: Caught Double Fish On Any Bait
config.caught-double-fish-on-any-bait.de: You will get a chance to catch two fish regardless of the bait you are using. This can be used in conjunction with Always Caught Double Fish.
config.always-max-cast-power.name: Always Max Cast Power
